text:
Hi Team,
When we stop the tomcat by command./shutdown.sh and try to start Tomcat in solaris platform by ./startup.sh command it is always throwing the below exception.Please help us by giving solution ASAP.


Error: Exception thrown by the agent : java.rmi.server.ExportException: Port already in use: 9898; nested exception is: 
	java.net.BindException: Address already in use

Regards,
Krishna
creator: chaitanyasree@gmail.com
markt@apache.org
text: Bugzilla is not a support forum. Please use the users mailing list.

creator: chaitanyasree@gmail.com
text:
Hi Mark Thomas,
Thanks for update. Please let us know who are users mailing list.
Actually we are in emergency to fix this issue.

Regards,
Krishna

http://tomcat.apache.org/findhelp.html
Please do not re-open this issue.
creator: markt@apache.org
